title: Marnie Simpson is still pregnant as she waits for one week overdue baby to arrive
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Geordie Shore star Marnie Simpson has revealed she is still waiting for her overdue baby to arrive.

She posted a photo on Instagram alongside her dog, as she vented about sleeping terribly.

"The most restless night sleep EVER, so happy I have this little guy to keep me company on days like this", she wrote.



She also told fans how far along she was in the hashtags, which said: " #41weeks #stillpregnant #justwaiting ".

She is due any minute to give birth to her baby boy, with boyfriend Casey Johnson.

(Image: Instagram)

She even has her hospital bag packed ready to go when the time comes.

Marnie previously joked about the baby being late.

She wrote alongside a bump snap: "Trust me to be over due. I was never gonna be early was I, I’m never early for anything.

She added: "Little man takes after his mamma and is fashionably late."

(Image: @marns/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She also said she can't wait to have a family with Casey.

She wrote on Instagram: "I’m so happy me and casey get to experience this together It’s gonna be so intense, my mind can’t cope with the Emotions it’s so overwhelming Im so full of love i could burst!!!!

"Roll on the next 7 days baby boy mammy and daddy are ready & waiting the count down is ONNNN!!! "
description: Marnie Simpson is still waiting for her baby boy to arrive, and he is now one week overdue
